description: A "possible harmful substance" was discovered at the house in Ancrum in the Scottish Borders.
title: Ancrum property sealed off after man's body found
title_page: Ancrum property sealed off after man's body found - BBC News
maintext:
Police sealed off a property in a Scottish Borders village at the weekend following the discovery of an 81-year-old man's body.
The front of the large detached house in Ancrum was cordoned off after a "possible harmful substance" was found inside on Saturday evening.
Officers in a patrol car remained at the scene on Sunday while the full circumstances of the death were being investigated.
However, Police Scotland said that while the death remained "unexplained" it was believed there were no suspicious circumstances.
